Articles.Content:
Hey everyone! My name is Kirk, and I\'ve FINALLY got around to using this forum! I plan on making youtube videos teaching orbital mechanics in a let\'s play fashion using KSP, so I\'ll probably be asking all you higher intellects lot\'s of questions throughout the course of the series! I\'d appreciate anyone who wants to come check out my first video, where I go to minmus by way of a gravity assist via the mun.

http://youtu.be/FThBJKbXBik

thanks guys!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Thank\'s Capt\'n Skunky! Hey, we\'re both Captains! My parents were very cruel (or cool, in my point of view, lol) and named me after captain kirk! TRUE STORY!

I was going to go with a KHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAN joke, but I figured you\'ve heard them all.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
lol, yes, from 'beam me up scotty' to 'khhaaaaaAAAANNN!!!' to 'live long and prosper'. a friend of mine even said 'make it so' once. I yelled at him for confusing me with the wrong captain!

Kirkula, do you have \'intimacy\' with every female you see?

(If I get in trouble, sorry. It is a Kirk joke after all... I grew up on that show. I was also nicknamed Mercury by my peers, oddly enough...)
